entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Saskatoon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:42 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -13.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saskatoon Diefenbaker Int'l Airport 04:00 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -13.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -15.2°C
Wind: W 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 5

entry.title: Thursday night: Fog. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 01:44 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Fog dissipating. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Fog dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 01:44 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 01:44 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023
